title: Champion Mastery Visibility.
body:
So right now i'm confused with Champion mastery, why is it that the enemy can't see the emote, but if they pay attention to kill banners that come up for X killed Y that can see what mastery you have.

This seems extremely illogical to me in that we can't flash our bling at them in the loading screen/in game, but they can find out by getting a kill.

Why is this Rito?

replies.body: Rito said that they didn't want to let the enemy see it because it's another BM (Mad Manners) tool if they do let the enemy see you showing off your champion mastery.

> [{quoted}](name=99Dman99,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ENL8V0El,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-19T11:57:47.283+0000)
>
> Rito said that they didn't want to let the enemy see it because it's another BM (Mad Manners) tool if they do let the enemy see you showing off your champion mastery.

Yet they are going against that statement when the enemy has the power to see it when you die.
Bragging rights locked and loaded
